name: 古典力學
goals: Understand the basic concepts and theories of classical mechanics
Strengthen physical thinking and problem-solving skills
syllabus:
【16+2 Weeks】

Week 1: Introduction  
Week 2: Generalized Forces  
Week 3: Lagrange Equations  
Week 4: Hamilton’s Variational Principle  
Week 5: Symmetry and Conservation Laws Scattering  
Week 6: Central Force Fields   
Week 7: Kepler’s Problem   
Week 8: Scattering   
Week 9: Midterm Exam 

Week 10: Non-Inertial Frames

Week 11: Motions in a Non-Inertial Frame of Reference

Week 12: Hamiltons Canonical Equations

Week 13: Poisson’s Bracket & Generating Functions

Week 14: Canonical Transformations

Week 15: Infinitesimal Canonical Transformations

Week 16: Final Exam

Week 17: Self-directed Learning

Week 18: Self-directed Learning
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
